sentences.sContent: Seismic stratigraphy - the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seismic stratigraphy - the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data.
sentences.sCn: 地震地层学-- 按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.sContent: Seismic stratigraphy is the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data .
sentences.sContent_eng: Seismic stratigraphy is the study of stratigraphy and depositional facies as interpreted from seismic data .
sentences.sCn: 地震地层学是按照地震资料解释进行地层学和沉积相的研究。

sentences.sContent: The strontium isotope stratigraphy (SIS) is predominantly used for correlation and dating of marine sediments.
sentences.sContent_eng: The strontium isotope stratigraphy (SIS) is predominantly used for correlation and dating of marine sediments.
sentences.sCn: 锶同位素地层学在海相地层的对比和定年中具有十分重要的作用。

remMethod.val: strat(散布) + i + graph(写； 图) + y → 有关(岩石的)分布情况 → 地层学

words.tran: （组织的）层；[地质] 地层；社会阶层

trans.tranCn: 地层学； 地层中的岩石组成
trans.tranOther: the study of the composition, relative positions, etc, of rock strata in order to determine their geological history
